user.title: Connect to Nostradamus Add-on
user.description: Enter the URL of your Nostradamus add-on. If running as a local add-on, use the default URL.

target.title: Select Target Entity
target.description: Choose the sensor you want to predict. This should be a numeric sensor with historical data.

supporting.title: Select Supporting Entities
supporting.description: Optionally select other sensors that might influence your target. For example, outdoor temperature for indoor temperature prediction.

horizon.title: Configure Forecast Horizon
horizon.description: How many steps into the future should we predict? The step size is automatically detected from your sensor's update frequency.

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to the Nostradamus add-on. Make sure it's installed and running.
error.invalid_horizon: Horizon must be at least 1 step.

abort.already_configured: This entity is already configured for forecasting.
